channel.title: Self Improvement on Eric Khun
channel.description: Recent content in Self Improvement on Eric Khun

item.title: I did a Plum.io test
item.description: An ex-classmate asked me today to do a Plum.io. I was expecting a coding/algo/logic test. But it was mostly some soft skills questions with a small part of logic. My results are available here. I’m a the top 5% to Conflict Resolution, Teamwork, and Communication. I’m not totally sure what means the top 5%, and really curious about my score on the other categories. What’s also interesting, is that I did the test a second time, and got a lower score.
